nodes.text: The Cyberlegs Mod II was a model of cybernetic legs made by BioTech Industries, the leading manufacturer in cybernetic body parts. The limbs were designed to replace legs lost in an accident, but also provided greater power than most organic legs. The legs were available for 10,000 as a pair, and could not be purchased singularly. They were available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
The Cyberlegs Mod II was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
